includedAssets.title: Sin City
includedAssets.synopsis: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City. Stylish comic-book action with Mickey Rourke, Clive Owen and Bruce Willis.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Three corrupt heroes search for vigilante justice on the streets of Basin City. Stylish action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City. Stylish comic-book action with Mickey Rourke, Clive Owen and Bruce Willis.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Sin City 2: A Dame To Kill For
includedAssets.synopsis: Mickey Rourke, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Jessica Alba star in this sequel to the comic book thriller.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mickey Rourke, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Jessica Alba star in this sequel to the comic book thriller.

includedAssets.title: Sin City Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: A series of antiheroes search for bloody revenge on the streets of Basin City. Stylish action based on Frank Miller's comic book series. Bruce Willis, Mickey Rourke, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Jessica Alba star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A star-studded cast of antiheroes search for revenge on the streets of Basin City. Stylish adaptation of Frank Miller's comic book series.
